content.text:
# 2000 Warsaw Cup by Heros – Singles

Cristina Torrens Valero}}
| champ    =  Henrieta Nagyová
| runner   =  Amanda Hopmans
| score    = 2–6, 6–4, 7–5
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Warsaw Open
| before_name = Warsaw Cup by Heros
| after_year = 2002
| after_name = J&S Cup
| draw     = 32 (2/4/1)
| seeds    = 8
}}
Cristina Torrens Valero was the defending champion, but lost in quarterfinals to Jennifer Hopkins.
Henrieta Nagyová won the title by defeating Amanda Hopmans 2–6, 6–4, 7–5 in the final.
Seeds
Elena Likhovtseva (first round)
#  Kristina Brandi (first round)
#  Tathiana Garbin (quarterfinals)
#  Nadia Petrova (first round)
#  Kristie Boogert (second round)
#  Adriana Gerši (second round)
#  Patricia Wartusch (second round)
#  Olga Barabanschikova (quarterfinals)
}}
